page.title: 02Armed Forces
page.content:
The Upper Heyford air base dominates the region. It covers the whole of the eastern half of the block with the runway and military buildings to the north and the associated housing and amenities for military personnel to the south.
The base, although technically under the control of the Royal Air Force, is leased to the American armed forces and is one of the principal United States Air Force bases in Europe. There is only one British officer on the base and he acts as a liaison officer between the American forces, the RAF, and the local population.Any problems or complaints from local residents concerning American personnel must first be repoted to the liaison officer.
